ModMetaData.name: More Max Memes
ModMetaData.author: kenx00x
ModMetaData.description:
One of (in my opinion) best mods for increase the max number of memes. Alas, it hasn't appeared to be updated, so here is a temporary port: It is been ported by: CTH2004
P.S. if the author asks, I will remove this, no questions asked. So, if it disapeares, you know why!
Anyways, here's the original (much better than mine) description:
With this mod you can have way more memes with ideology (0-100 memes by default). You can change the minimum memes and the maximum memes in the mod settings options. You can also change how many memes NPC factions have (1-3 memes by default). You can also change the maximum amount of venerated animals (18 venerated animals by default).
